name: Catalonia Catedral

reviews.text: Super high quality experience !
reviews.title: Outstanding Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Loved the contemporary design & decor.
reviews.title: Perfect location

reviews.text: Everything looked new and perfect.
reviews.title: excellent hotel. worth every cent!

reviews.text: Very comfortable everything.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel
Reservations Not Honored
reviews.text: Staff was great, friendly, happy.

We booked this hotel for three nights. I didn't have any expectations, last couple of times I was in Spain I found it difficult to find a nice place with comfortable beds. However, I was pleasantly surprised: the hotel is in an excellent location (yet very quiet), it is small, well-designed, not overpriced and the staff seems very committed to their guests. We booked a superior room with a terrace, it was worth paying a little extra. Overall, I don't think we would have find a better place to stay... Looking forward to return to the Catalonia Cathedral!
reviews.title: Perfect location, great little hotel with excellent beds

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights, and enjoyed it a lot. It's easy to get to (take the bus from the airport to Plaza Catalunya and then walk for 5 minutes), and it's easy to explore the city from there thanks to the central location. Interior is neat, quite trendy, and the staff is friendly. The room was clean and nice, bed was good, and we didn't hear any noise from the outside (we did hear some noise from the corridor, but it was no big thing). The roof terrace & pool are also quite nice, nothing big though. To summarize: an excellent place for a citytrip to Barcelona.
reviews.title: Great location & very comfortable place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just one night in Barcelona and found this to be an ideal hotel. Been here many times so know the area well. The hotel ticked all the right boxes. I'd stay again for longer.
reviews.title: Doesnt get much better than this

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've just returned from a 2 night stay at the Catalonia Catedral. We went for a sight seeing break and to have some time away from our little ones.
reviews.title: Great hotel in a fabulous location..

reviews.text: The hotel is based in the hustle and bustle of central Barcalona, but the hotel is so peaceful and quiet. The rooms are very clean and modern. The shower is amazing, really warm and powerful.
reviews.title: BEST HOTEL EVER

reviews.text: Booked through booking.com, 3 night weekend standard room for 400 euro.
reviews.title: Very comfortable rooms, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ideal location, comfortable room with good size bath.
reviews.title: Ideal location, very central, yet quiet and peaceful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Swimming pool max 7 meters length (excl stairs)
reviews.title: great hotel overall enhanced by amazing reception staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good breakfast for 16 euro
reviews.title: VERY HELPFULL HOTEL

reviews.text: Preference for double bed was honoured, a true double bed, not 2 singles!.
reviews.title: Nice hotel in great location

reviews.text: Stayed here for 3 nights after a Med cruise. Contemporary hotel with an excellent location next to the Cathedral but also minutes to Placa da Cataluyna, La Rambla and lots of shopping. Rooms a excellent and very clean and the shower is wonderful, especially after long days walking around the city.
reviews.title: Excellent location

reviews.text: There's one thing to be said about this hotel.LOCATION.In the center of everything,culture,dining,transportation.All within walking distance.Rooms aren't big, but who stays inside while in Barcelona?Breakfast was satisfactory.My only problem was the noise during the night from a small Vietnamese joint beneath our room.
reviews.title: WE WILL PROBABLY BE BACK

reviews.text: Location is a plus it is in the heart of Barcelona, closeto La Ramblas. From there you can explore the city, you can walk to nearest restaurants and they are so many choices, you can also explore a lot of shops and stores, you can even walk by the beach if you prefer walking. The service is superb everything you request they do it promptly. It is clean, the room size is just perfet. Lastly the staff are friendly and courteous.
reviews.title: Excellent & well located ..!!

reviews.text: I couldn't have picked a better hotel! Arrived in Barcelona exhausted, took the airport bus straight to Placa Catalunya and was very pleased to find that hotel is only 5 minutes walk in the center of restaurants and shopping. La Rambla is also a quick 5-10 minute walk. Hotel is updated, contemporary and very well kept. There is small pool on the rooftop ample for chilling out and sunbathing. Didn't try the restaurant or the breakfast, but 16Euros is reasonable in Barcelona, trust me. The room was very nice and comfortable. I loved the rain shower in the bathroom. Most important - very clean. We were 3 and they set up an extra bed for my son. The staff was very pleasant and accommodated all our needs. If there is a downside, it was only that they couldn't give us our room when we arrived at 11am and we had to walk around town exhausted while we waited to be able to check in at 2pm. You can hang out by the pool area though, but it was hot and we opted to just start taking in the city. Stay here, you won't regret it!
reviews.title: Great hotel in the city center

reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel very close to the Catedral. The location is perfect for walking tours.
reviews.title: Great experience

description: enovated modernist building, Catalonia Catedral Hotel is located in the heart of the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona.The hotel is by the Cathedral, Plaça Sant Jaume and the unavoidable Portal de l’Àngel. After a day of shopping, cultural visits or just walk down city enjoys a drink in the lobby bar or the international cuisine in the warm Restaurant or just rest of the bustle of the downtown without leaving it.
